name: Pseudogravity
description:
ENTER A DOOR AND THE ROOM ROTATES!

Looks like just another day in the lab, you’re stuck in an endless pseudo-gravity cube. Can you escape this time?

If you enjoyed this game, please leave a rating and a comment <3.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: View
  • Space: Jump
  • Hold R: Reset

This game was made in 15 hours (1 day) by 2 people.

Follow us on twitter: @RemusRain
